title: Sorry, the explainer is dead
description: Remember when we told journalists to write more explainers? Yeah, sorry about that. We said the future of journalism was a broader take on news, one that was more focused on utility information to help readers navigate their lives. We said, more explainers, more news-you-can-use, more recipes! Today, our readers query AI for all that...
